All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPlayer
    Player class for an AI player.
    AITest
    Test AI related attributes and gameplay, i.e.
    AIvsAITest
    Showcase gameplay between an AI and an AI.
    AutomatedClient  
    AutomatedGame
    AutomatedGame runs through the motions of playing the Game, without any kind of feedback.
    AutomatedServer  
    AutomatedTest  
    Board
    Board represents the full DIM * DIM Pentago board.
    BoardGridCharacter
    BoardGridCharacter holds the allowed characters for drawing the Board grid.
    BoardGridStyle
    BoardGridStyle specifies a way in which the Board grid is drawn.
    BoardPositionException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to place a Marble at a certain position on a Board, while that position was either out of bounds or already occupied by another non-empty Marble.
    BoardSkin
    BoardSkin controls how the Board will look.
    BoardTest
    Testing class to validate all relevant properties of the Board.
    BotInputHandler
    BotInputHandler extends OnlineTextInputHandler by automatically sending commands to the server, while still providing some basic user options through a text-based interface to control the Bot.
    ChessNotation
    Helper class to convert String containing chess notation to Board indices and vice versa.
    ChessNotationFormatException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert a chess notation string to an int index value or vice versa, but that the string or int does not have the appropriate format.
    Client
    The Client maintains a list of listeners to update whenever something noteworthy happens.
    ClientHandler
    ClientHandler acts as the Server's representative in dealing with a connected Client.
    ClientListener
    The listener interface for receiving "interesting" client events, such as a message, a move, etc.
    ClientProtocolHandler
    ClientProtocolHandler receives messages from the Server and parses them.
    Colors
    ANSI color codes.
    Config
    Stores some settings.
    ConnectionTimer
    ConnectionTimer needs to determine how long it takes for a user to be logged in, because if a user stays idle, valuable server resources are still taken up.
    ConversionTest
    Tests for index conversion, "chess" notation, rotation conversion.
    DirectWinStrategy
    DirectWinStrategy is a type of Strategy that plays randomly, unless it can block an opponents win or win directly itself (in essence looking ahead 1 step).
    EasyAI
    EasyAI is a type of AIPlayer that plays randomly, unless it can block an opponents win or win directly itself (in essence looking ahead 1 step).
    FileHandler
    Handles storing and retrieving files on the user's system.
    Game
    Game holds the two Player objects and the Board.
    GameManager
    GameManager continually matches the first two players that enter the game queue.
    HardAI
    HardAI is a type of AI that uses min-maxing with smarter heuristics.
    HumanAITest
    Showcase gameplay between a human player and an AI.
    HumanGameTest
    Showcase gameplay between two dummy human players.
    HumanPlayer
    Representation of a human player, a kind of player that has an associated AIPlayer to provide a maximum number of hints during gameplay.
    InputHandler
    The InputHandler processes user input and tells the Client what to do with it.
    Leaderboard
    Leaderboard represents the rankings on a Server.
    Logger
    Basic Logger.
    LoggingLevel  
    Marble
    Marble represents the state a field on the Board can be in, which is either empty, or held by either of two players, identified by black and white.
    MarbleStyle
    MarbleStyle specifies in what way the player Marbles are drawn.
    MediumAI
    MediumAI is a type of AIPlayer that determines its strategy using a min-max algorithm.
    MenuTest
    MenuTest tests the TUIMenu and indirectly the TUIMenuOption.
    MessageFactory
    MessageFactory deals only with the proper formatting of messages.
    MinMaxHeuristicStrategy
    MinMaxHeuristicStrategy is a type of Strategy that determines its moves using a min-max algorithm and some smart heuristics.
    MinMaxStrategy
    MinMaxStrategy is a type of Strategy that determines its moves using a min-max algorithm.
    Move
    Encodes a Move of a Player, including the index to place a Marble at, the quadrant to rotate, and the direction of rotation.
    MovePositionFormatException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert an int to a Move position value, but that the int does not have the appropriate range.
    NaiveAI
    A Naive implementation of an AIPlayer, i.e.
    NaiveStrategy
    NaiveStrategy is a Strategy that uses randomly generated moves.
    NameGenerator
    NameGenerator is meant to be used to randomly generates names for bots.
    NetworkFactory
    Factory class to generate all Client/Server related objects.
    OfflineClient
    An offline client to play the game.
    OfflineTextInputHandler
    TextInputHandler handles player input through the command line (System.in).
    OnlineClient
    The OnlineClient maintains a list of listeners to update whenever something noteworthy happens.
    OnlineTextInputHandler
    The OnlineTextInputHandler processes user input from System.in and tells the Client what to do with it.
    PingPong
    PingPong periodically pings all connected clients, and requests the Server to check how many ClientHandler objects are still active.
    Player
    Player class to store name and Marble attributes.
    PlayerFactory
    Factory class for Player generation.
    ProtocolCode
    An Enum to store all possible (supported) client-server protocol codes.
    ProtocolHandler
    ProtocolHandler standardizes the communicates between clients and server and abstracts it away from specific Client or Server implementations.
    Quadrant
    Quadrant represents one of four sub boards of Board.
    QuadrantFormatException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert a string to a Quadrant value, but that the string does not have the appropriate format.
    Randomizer
    Saved and reused Random object for efficiency.
    RankedPlayer
    RankedPlayer represents a Player's gameplay stats.
    Rotation
    Encodes a Rotation of a Quadrant, either clockwise or counterclockwise.
    RotationFormatException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert an int to a Rotation value, but that the int does not have the appropriate range.
    Server
    Server provides a platform for Clients to connect to and play games together.
    ServerFullGameTest  
    ServerInputHandler
    Just runs in a thread to listen to commands from System.in and do something to the Server based on it, while the Server itself only listens to new connections from Clients.
    ServerProtocolHandler
    ServerProtocolHandler receives messages from the Client and parses them.
    ServerTest
    Test for validating message content when sending to and receiving from the Server.
    Strategy
    Strategy describes a gameplay Strategy.
    TextDisplay
    TextDisplay displays events from the Client on System.out.
    TUIClientLauncher
    TUIClientLauncher acts as the entry point of the client application.
    TUIInputField
    TUIInputField provides a convenient way to group together to ask the user for certain input in startup and configuration menus, not gameplay input.
    TUIMenu
    TUIMenu provides a convenient way to create selection menus.
    The class is meant to be used (instantiated) this way (e.g.), where scanner should be a System.in Scanner:
    TUIMenuOption
    TUIMenuOption represents a menu option in a TUIMenu.
    TUIMenus
    TUIClientMenus acts as a utility class to hold and run various configuration menus.
    TUIServerLauncher
    Runs a TUI server application.
